name: Embeddings
description: Generate embeddings within Weaviate Cloud, without needing to connect to a third-party provider.
longDescription: Say goodbye to rate limits and the hassle of managing multiple embedding providers.

name: Query Agent
description: Enable users to query your database in natural language.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Query Agent allows users within your organization to use a natural language prompt to query your database.

name: Transformation Agent
description: Augment and improve your entire  dataset with a single prompt.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Transformation Agent lets you manipulate your data using simple prompts.

name: Personalization Agent
description: Dynamically personalize experiences based on user behavior.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Personalization Agent learns user behavior and can personalize any experience.

name: Weaviate Serverless Cloud
description: AI-native vector database, fully-managed in Weaviate Cloud.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Personalization Agent learns user behavior and can personalize any experience.

name: Weaviate Enterprise Cloud
description: AI-native vector database, fully-managed in a dedicated instance in Weaviate Cloud.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Personalization Agent learns user behavior and can personalize any experience.

name: Bring Your Own Cloud
description: AI-native vector database, managed by us in your cloud environment.
longDescription: Weaviate’s Personalization Agent learns user behavior and can personalize any experience.
